      • getAggregation

        public Terms getAggregation(SearchResponse searchResponse,
                            String aggregationName)
        Returns the aggregation that is associated with the specified name. This method also validates that the retrieved aggregation exists.
        Parameters:
        searchResponse - the response of the search request
        aggregationName - the name of the aggregation
        Returns:
        the aggregation

                                  String nestedAggregationName,
                                  String subAggregationName)

        Parameters:
        searchResponse - the response of the search request
        nestedAggregationName - the name of the nested aggregation
        subAggregationName - the name of the sub-aggregation
        Returns:
        the aggregation
